channel.title: DalaCity - Enter your dream world
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3xKos.png[/img][/center]
(<1MB) [b]Client download:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?8r6oejcwudakb6q [b]mirror:[/b] http://www.sendspace.com/file/82w07a
[b]Visit the forums here:[/b] www.dalacity.org
[b]Latest update: Highscores have been added.[/b]
[size=18pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size] DalaCity has been developed with the eye on the good old 2006 era in combination of originality. All skills are programmed into detail as how it was in 2006. There are teleports to different places in the world, but there are also places that are harder to find with much things to do. There are also hidden features that will only become visible while playing. DalaCity is always under development for adding new features and to provide you better gameplay. Therefore we also count on our players, you can add your suggestions, bugs, glitches etcetera on the forums.
[size=18pt][b]Team:[/b][/size] RandQm: Programmer, owner xifej: web developper, owner arham4: co-programmer, head-admin tekstyle: ingame control, admin dylan: overall help, head moderator
[b]I won't type out a list of features since I know most people just skip to media anyways, so here's some [size=18pt][b]Media:[/b][/size][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xgr3G.png[/img]

Just to update RandQm; my laptop should be back within 3 days so your site will be done in around 5.

How can the site be done if we didn’t decide what to do yet lol

Highscores, a homepage template and integration to SMF forums was what I agreed with that other guy.

We already have highscores

In that case the price drops dramatically. For the template with integration it’ll only be 30.
[/quote]
I’ll speak ya later on skype[/quote]

Mkay man, I’ll try get on withing the next few hours.

@lostmyphat, not this time :p.

Read full topic

item.title: DalaCity - Enter your dream world
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:111, topic:459971”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=562881.msg4126816#msg4126816 date=1350528604]

You don’t have to be intelligent to play runescape, or private servers. I played when I was 7? A large amount of players are ages 11-14. So you’re just wrong there. Also, who wants a sophisticated boring quest? Let me answer that for you. No one. Arham can make his quests however he wants to make them, because he is the quest developer. Call me when you’re finished with your “sophisticated quest”.

I love your ideas Arham, keep going (;

I’m just going to assume you are a preteen, and relied on your spell checker to spell everything in that paragraph.

@Arham, very well. I’ve heard from multiple people that have worked with you that you are quite young, or at least act it. Enjoy your youth (I guess?)
[/quote]
I’m 11 for God’s sake lol.[/quote]
Ahh. See that validates your argument. I think you’re the youngest person I’ve met on these forums.

[quote=“Dyl4n20, post:112, topic:459971”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=562881.msg4126816#msg4126816 date=1350528604]

You don’t have to be intelligent to play runescape, or private servers. I played when I was 7? A large amount of players are ages 11-14. So you’re just wrong there. Also, who wants a sophisticated boring quest? Let me answer that for you. No one. Arham can make his quests however he wants to make them, because he is the quest developer. Call me when you’re finished with your “sophisticated quest”.

I love your ideas Arham, keep going (;

I’m just going to assume you are a preteen, and relied on your spell checker to spell everything in that paragraph.
[/quote]

You assume wrong, and no, I didn’t. Quit treating me like an idiot, I can guarantee that I’m smarter than you are. Just because you’re a “Moparian” gives you no right to act like you’re superior than everyone. I’m being as calm as possible.[/quote]
Just shut up and quit making yourself look stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: DalaCity - Enter your dream world
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:107, topic:459971”]@Arham, the flaws in your story lines are that they are quite immature, and makes it sound like I’m playing some shitty kids game like “Wizard 404” or w/e it’s called.

@Dylan: A majority of the RSPS community is not preteen, seeing as those that are under the age of 12 usually lack the basic knowledge of how to update their computer regularly, updating Java, so they usually don’t even make it online unless spoon-fed (I’m sure you are familiar with this term), now with that comment about making my own story line’s, I’ll admit, I’m not that creative with that kind of thing, BUT, I would at least make it sound more sophisticated and professional than what has been presented in front of me, Jagex’s quests are more mature than this.

@Arham (again): Because it restores one? You want your players to feel like they are reading a children’s book, playing your server? I You may say, “It was a good story”, when, no, it wasn’t. It’s a children’s book, it doesn’t have any twists, or literary tricks in it, children’s books are right to the point, because at that age you aren’t able to comprehend what the author is trying to say. If you would like, I could nip-pick at all of your quests and tell you why none of them make sense, and the ones that do make me feel seven.[/quote]
Make an example quest for me please?

[hr]

I’ll improvise. I’m starting to change the last quest. The other two stay, understand?

Read full topic

@Arham (again): Because it restores one? You want your players to feel like they are reading a children’s book, playing your server? I You may say, “It was a good story”, when, no, it wasn’t. It’s a children’s book, it doesn’t have any twists, or literary tricks in it, children’s books are right to the point, because at that age you aren’t able to comprehend what the author is trying to say. If you would like, I could nip-pick at all of your quests and tell you why none of them make sense, and the ones that do make me feel seven.
